description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Explosions anyone? Beware, this captivating puzzler melts your mind while you are flipping the fuses to build ever longer chains, for ever longer explosions and higher scores. Featuring lots of extras, four game modes, highscore lists, medals (with replays!) and online top-score lists – all wrapped into a stylish design, for hours of mind bending puzzle fun. (Top-scores require Xbox LIVE Gold.)
